item.title: Critic’s Notebook: ‘And Just Like That’ Series Finale Sees Carrie Bradshaw Go Out With a Whimper
item.description: After a season that wasted potential and time, the final episode of HBO Max’s ‘Sex and the City’ sequel series forced our heroine to image a future without male companionship. Yawn.
